list.name: uvmt_cv32
list.cmd: cd cv32/sim/uvmt_cv32; make corev-dv SIMULATOR=dsim DSIM_WORK=/mux-flow/build/repo/dsim_work; make comp SIMULATOR=dsim USE_ISS=YES DSIM_WORK=/mux-flow/build/repo/dsim_work
list.wavesCmd: cd cv32/sim/uvmt_cv32; make corev-dv SIMULATOR=dsim DSIM_WORK=/mux-flow/build/repo/dsim_work; make comp SIMULATOR=dsim USE_ISS=YES DSIM_WORK=/mux-flow/build/repo/dsim_work WAVES=1

list.name: uvmt_cv32_compliance_build
list.cmd: cd cv32/sim/uvmt_cv32; make all_compliance; make comp SIMULATOR=dsim USE_ISS=YES DSIM_WORK=/mux-flow/build/repo/dsim_work
list.wavesCmd: cd cv32/sim/uvmt_cv32; make all_compliance; make comp SIMULATOR=dsim USE_ISS=YES DSIM_WORK=/mux-flow/build/repo/dsim_work WAVES=1

regressions.name: cv32_compliance_regression
regressions.description: RISC-V Compliance Test-suite for CV32E40P using dynamic test generation

regressions.name: cv32_ci_check_regression
regressions.description: Commit sanity for CV32 using dynamic test generation

regressions.name: cv32_full_regression
regressions.description: Full regression for CV32 using dynamic test generation

regressions.name: cv32_interrupt_regression
regressions.description: Directed and random interrupt tests for CV32E40P

regressions.name: cv32_xpulp_isa_regression
regressions.description: XPULP ISA test-programs (and a few other tests that run with the RM disabled)
